sentences.sContent: Here’s an article which might interest you.
sentences.sCn: 这里有一篇文章，也许你会感兴趣。

sentences.sContent: What interests me is all the history of these places.
sentences.sCn: 使我感兴趣的是这些地方的历史。

sentences.sContent: It may interest you to know that a number of scholarships are available.
sentences.sCn: 你也许有兴趣知道将提供多项奖学金。

synos.tran: 兴趣，爱好；[金融]利息；趣味；同行

phrases.pCn: 个人利益；个人兴趣爱好
利益冲突；公职人员对公众义务与其本身利益相冲突
一般利益；一般娱乐；大众兴趣

words.tran: 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的
感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的

trans.tranCn: 使感兴趣； 引起…关注
trans.tranOther: to make someone want to pay attention to something and find out more about it

trans.tranCn: 兴趣，爱好；利息，利率；利益，好处；利害关系
trans.tranOther: if you have an interest in something or someone, you want to know or learn more about them
